messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Ask Fredrik Thordendal How's the new album coming along.
Sure—what phone number should I use to send Fredrik Thordendal the message?

It looks like I can’t send him a text without a phone number. Do you have any other way to reach Fredrik Thordendal—like an email address or social‐media handle—or would you like help figuring out how to get in touch?
I don't have any other contact details. Can you figure it out?

I’m not able to look up or generate Fredrik Thordendal’s personal phone number or private contact details. What I *can* do is help you find publicly available ways to reach him or his team. For example, you could:

• Check his official website or the site for his record label—artists often list booking or press-office e-mail addresses there.  
• Look for his management or booking agency, which usually have contact forms or published e-mail/phone info.  
• Send him a direct message through an official social-media channel (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter), if he or his band maintains one.  
• Reach out to the PR or press contacts for Meshuggah (his primary band) or related projects—they often forward fan and media inquiries.

Would you like guidance on any of these approaches, or help drafting an outreach message once you have an address?
No, that's fine. Thanks for giving me those ideas!
You’re welcome! If you need any more help drafting messages or researching contact options down the road, just let me know. Good luck!
